```{r}
#| eval: false
p <- SCpubr::do_DimPlot(sample = sample,
                        group.by = "relabelling",
                        font.size = 12,
                        raster = TRUE,
                        raster.dpi = 2048,
                        pt.size = 4,
                        colors.use = cluster_cols,

                        legend.ncol = 3,
                        na.value = "grey50")
```
